difference in log likelihood

# For case 1, we use the default initial value tau=0.6, omega=0.9, kappa=2.1, inibl=0.1.
# For case 2, we use the initial value tau=1, omega=0.1, kappa=2, inibl=0.01.
## we don't have 1053, 3278, and 4268 for this case.
# For case 3, we use the initial value tau=0.7, omega=0.3, kappa=2, inibl=0.1.
# For case 4, we use the initial value tau=0.2, omega=0.1, kappa=1.3, inibl=0.05
```{r}
lldif <- data.frame(MG[2,], MGcase2[2,], abs(MG[2,] - MGcase2_3[2,]), abs(MGcase2[2,]-MGcase2_2[2,]), abs(MGcase2_2[2,]-MGcase2_3[2,]))
colnames(lldif) <- c("MG", "MG case2", "difference", "dif_i1i2", "dif_i2i3")
datatable(lldif) %>%
  formatRound( columns = 1:5 , 5) %>% 
  formatStyle(c("difference", "dif_i1i2"), 
              background = styleColorBar(lldif$dif_i1i2 , 'lightblue'), 
              backgroundSize = '98% 88%', 
              backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat',
              backgroundPosition = 'center')

```

```{r}

kappadif <- abs(MG[7,] - MGcase2[7,])
omegadif <- abs(MG[8,] - MGcase2[8,])
taudif   <- abs(MG[9,] - MGcase2[9,])
otherParameter <- cbind(kappadif, omegadif, taudif) %>% data.frame()
colnames(otherParameter) <- c("kappa", "omega", "tau")
datatable(otherParameter) %>%
  formatRound( columns = 1:3 , 5) %>% 
  formatStyle(c("kappa", "omega", "tau"),
              background = styleColorBar(otherParameter$kappa, 'lightblue'), 
              backgroundSize = '98% 88%', 
              backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat',
              backgroundPosition = 'center')
```
